invalid_parameters.reason: mesh from the URL has to be the same as in body
invalid characters. A lowercase RFC 1123 subdomain must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters, '-' or '.', and must start and end with an alphanumeric character
invalid characters. Valid characters are numbers, lowercase latin letters and '-', '_', '.' symbols.
